example_sentence_en: The student wrote the lesson
Read in the name of your Lord who created (Al-Alaq 96:1)
Eat and drink, but do not be excessive (Al-A'raf 7:31)
The boy drank the milk
He went to the mosque
When the victory of Allah has come (An-Nasr 110:1)
And He taught Adam the names, all of them (Al-Baqarah 2:31)
We hear and we obey (Al-Baqarah 2:285)

example_sentence_ar: أَفَلَا يَنْظُرُونَ إِلَى الْإِبِلِ كَيْفَ خُلِقَتْ
example_sentence_en: Do they not look at the camels, how they are created? (Al-Ghashiyah 88:17)
He said: My Lord, expand for me my chest (Taha 20:25)
And I did not do it of my own accord (Al-Kahf 18:82)

english_meaning: to make, to place, to render
example_sentence_ar: وَجَعَلْنَا مِنَ الْمَاءِ كُلَّ شَيْءٍ حَيٍّ
example_sentence_en: And We made from water every living thing (Al-Anbiya 21:30)
He created man from a clinging substance (Al-Alaq 96:2)
You alone we worship, and You alone we ask for help (Al-Fatiha 1:5)
Enter it in peace, safe and secure (Al-Hijr 15:46)
He left the house early
Indeed, We have given you a clear conquest (Al-Fath 48:1)
And she closed the doors (Yusuf 12:23)
The man sat on the chair
Arise and warn (Al-Muddaththir 74:2)

example_sentence_ar: وَعِبَادُ الرَّحْمَنِ الَّذِينَ يَمْشُونَ عَلَى الْأَرْضِ هَوْنًا
example_sentence_en: The servants of the Most Merciful walk upon the earth humbly (Al-Furqan 25:63)
And We made your sleep a means of rest (An-Naba 78:9)
Take what We have given you with determination (Al-Baqarah 2:63)
Indeed, We have granted you Al-Kawthar (Al-Kawthar 108:1)
Did He not find you an orphan and give you refuge? (Ad-Duha 93:6)
Indeed we belong to Allah, and to Him we shall return (Al-Baqarah 2:156)

example_sentence_ar: وَإِذَا سَأَلَكَ عِبَادِي عَنِّي فَإِنِّي قَرِيبٌ
example_sentence_en: When My servants ask you about Me, indeed I am near (Al-Baqarah 2:186)
So their Lord responded to them (Aal-Imran 3:195)
His mother carried him with hardship upon hardship (Luqman 31:14)

english_meaning: to put, to place, to set down
example_sentence_en: And We removed from you your burden (Ash-Sharh 94:2)

english_meaning: to strike, to set forth (an example)
example_sentence_en: And present to them an example (Yasin 36:13)

english_meaning: to memorize, to preserve, to guard
example_sentence_ar: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نَزَّلْنَا الذِّكْرَ وَإِنَّا لَهُ لَحَافِظُونَ
example_sentence_en: Indeed, We sent down the reminder and We will be its guardian (Al-Hijr 15:9)
And We gave understanding of it to Solomon (Al-Anbiya 21:79)
They recognize him as they recognize their sons (Al-Baqarah 2:146)

example_sentence_ar: أَلَمْ تَرَ كَيْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِأَصْحَابِ الْفِيلِ
example_sentence_en: Have you not seen how your Lord dealt with the companions of the elephant? (Al-Fil 105:1)

example_sentence_ar: قُلْ إِنْ كُنْتُمْ تُحِبُّونَ اللَّهَ فَاتَّبِعُونِي
example_sentence_en: Say: If you love Allah, then follow me (Aal-Imran 3:31)

example_sentence_ar: وَعَسَى أَنْ تَكْرَهُوا شَيْئًا وَهُوَ خَيْرٌ لَكُمْ
example_sentence_en: Perhaps you dislike a thing and it is good for you (Al-Baqarah 2:216)

example_sentence_ar: وَاصْبِرْ فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ لَا يُضِيعُ أَجْرَ الْمُحْسِنِينَ
example_sentence_en: Be patient, for Allah does not waste the reward of the good-doers (Hud 11:115)
If you are grateful, I will surely increase you (Ibrahim 14:7)
Remember Me, I will remember you (Al-Baqarah 2:152)
They forgot Allah, so He forgot them (At-Tawbah 9:67)

english_meaning: to call, to invoke, to supplicate
example_sentence_en: Call upon Me; I will respond to you (Ghafir 40:60)
So pray to your Lord and sacrifice (Al-Kawthar 108:2)
Fasting has been prescribed for you (Al-Baqarah 2:183)

example_sentence_ar: آمَنَ الرَّسُولُ بِمَا أُنْزِلَ إِلَيْهِ مِنْ رَبِّهِ
example_sentence_en: The Messenger believed in what was revealed to him from his Lord (Al-Baqarah 2:285)

example_sentence_ar: وَمَنْ كَفَرَ فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ غَنِيٌّ عَنِ الْعَالَمِينَ
example_sentence_en: Whoever disbelieves, Allah is free from need of the worlds (Aal-Imran 3:97)
Guide us to the straight path (Al-Fatiha 1:6)
Our Lord, forgive us our sins (Aal-Imran 3:147)
And My mercy encompasses all things (Al-A'raf 7:156)
Indeed, Allah ordains what He intends (Al-Ma'idah 5:1)
Indeed, Allah orders justice and good conduct (An-Nahl 16:90)
And prevented the soul from desire (An-Nazi'at 79:40)
And the heaven We constructed with strength (Adh-Dhariyat 51:47)

english_meaning: to dwell, to reside, to be still
example_sentence_ar: وَاللَّهُ جَعَلَ لَكُمْ مِنْ بُيُوتِكُمْ سَكَنًا
example_sentence_en: Allah has made for you from your homes a place of rest (An-Nahl 16:80)
And that day the believers will rejoice (Ar-Rum 30:4)

example_sentence_ar: فَلَا خَوْفٌ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا هُمْ يَحْزَنُونَ
example_sentence_en: No fear will there be concerning them, nor will they grieve (Al-Baqarah 2:62)
Let them laugh a little and weep much (At-Tawbah 9:82)
So he smiled, laughing at her speech (An-Naml 27:19)
The mother cooked delicious food
Wash your faces and your forearms (Al-Ma'idah 5:6)
But the clothing of righteousness, that is best (Al-A'raf 7:26)
Allah has permitted trade and forbidden interest (Al-Baqarah 2:275)

example_sentence_ar: وَمِنَ النَّاسِ مَنْ يَشْتَرِي لَهْوَ الْحَدِيثِ
example_sentence_en: And of the people is he who buys the amusement of speech (Luqman 31:6)

english_meaning: to work, to do, to act
example_sentence_ar: وَمَنْ يَعْمَلْ مِنَ الصَّالِحَاتِ وَهُوَ مُؤْمِنٌ
example_sentence_en: Whoever does righteous deeds while being a believer (Taha 20:112)
Is it you who makes it grow, or are We the grower? (Al-Waqi'ah 56:64)
And give its due on the day of harvest (Al-An'am 6:141)
And if you are on a journey (Al-Baqarah 2:283)
And horses, mules, and donkeys for you to ride (An-Nahl 16:8)
He taught man that which he knew not (Al-Alaq 96:5)
And so they will say: You have studied (Al-An'am 6:105)
Prostrate and draw near (Al-Alaq 96:19)
And bow with those who bow (Al-Baqarah 2:43)
And turn to Allah in repentance, all of you (An-Nur 24:31)
Seek forgiveness of your Lord and repent to Him (Hud 11:3)
And spend in the way of Allah (Al-Baqarah 2:195)

english_meaning: to put trust in Allah, to rely upon
example_sentence_ar: وَعَلَى اللَّهِ فَتَوَكَّلُوا إِنْ كُنْتُمْ مُؤْمِنِينَ
example_sentence_en: And upon Allah rely, if you are believers (Al-Ma'idah 5:23)

example_sentence_ar: وَعْدَ اللَّهِ لَا يُخْلِفُ اللَّهُ وَعْدَهُ
example_sentence_en: The promise of Allah. Allah does not fail in His promise (Ar-Rum 30:6)
Indeed, We sent it down during the Night of Decree (Al-Qadr 97:1)
We have not sent you except as a mercy to the worlds (Al-Anbiya 21:107)

example_sentence_ar: إِنْ يَنْصُرْكُمُ اللَّهُ فَلَا غَالِبَ لَكُمْ
example_sentence_en: If Allah should aid you, no one can overcome you (Aal-Imran 3:160)

example_sentence_ar: وَلَا تَقْتُلُوا النَّفْسَ الَّتِي حَرَّمَ اللَّهُ إِلَّا بِالْحَقِّ
example_sentence_en: Do not kill the soul which Allah has forbidden except by right (Al-Isra 17:33)

english_meaning: to give life, to bring to life
example_sentence_ar: يُحْيِي وَيُمِيتُ وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
example_sentence_en: He gives life and causes death, and He is over all things competent (Al-Hadid 57:2)
Exalt the name of your Lord, the Most High (Al-A'la 87:1)
You alone we worship, and You alone we ask for help (Al-Fatiha 1:5)

english_meaning: to fear Allah, to be pious
example_sentence_ar: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا اتَّقُوا اللَّهَ
example_sentence_en: O you who believe, fear Allah (Al-Hashr 59:18)

example_sentence_ar: لَهَا مَا كَسَبَتْ وَعَلَيْهَا مَا اكْتَسَبَتْ
example_sentence_en: It will have what it has gained, and it will bear what it has earned (Al-Baqarah 2:286)

example_sentence_ar: قُلْ إِنَّ الْخَاسِرِينَ الَّذِينَ خَسِرُوا أَنْفُسَهُمْ
example_sentence_en: Say: The losers are those who will lose themselves (Az-Zumar 39:15)
Race toward forgiveness from your Lord (Al-Hadid 57:21)

example_sentence_ar: فَمَنْ تَبِعَ هُدَايَ فَلَا خَوْفٌ عَلَيْهِمْ
example_sentence_en: Whoever follows My guidance, no fear upon them (Al-Baqarah 2:38)
And obey Allah and obey the Messenger (An-Nisa 4:59)
And Adam disobeyed his Lord and erred (Taha 20:121)
We give you good tidings of a boy whose name will be Yahya (Maryam 19:7)
He neither begets nor is born (Al-Ikhlas 112:3)
Every soul will taste death (Aal-Imran 3:185)
And he to whom We grant long life, We reverse him in creation (Yasin 36:68)

english_meaning: to fall, to happen, to occur
example_sentence_en: When the Occurrence occurs (Al-Waqi'ah 56:1)

example_sentence_ar: سُبْحَانَ رَبِّكَ رَبِّ الْعِزَّةِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ
example_sentence_en: Exalted is your Lord, the Lord of might, above what they describe (As-Saffat 37:180)
And has forbidden interest (Al-Baqarah 2:275)
Allah has permitted trade (Al-Baqarah 2:275)

english_meaning: to begin, to start, to originate
example_sentence_en: As We began the first creation, We will repeat it (Al-Anbiya 21:104)
Do not grieve; indeed Allah is with us (At-Tawbah 9:40)
Whoever hopes for the meeting with Allah (Al-Ankabut 29:5)

example_sentence_ar: يُعَذِّبُ مَنْ يَشَاءُ وَيَرْحَمُ مَنْ يَشَاءُ
example_sentence_en: He punishes whom He wills and has mercy on whom He wills (Al-Ankabut 29:21)

example_sentence_ar: وَمَنْ يُضْلِلِ اللَّهُ فَمَا لَهُ مِنْ هَادٍ
example_sentence_en: Whoever Allah sends astray, there is no guide for him (Al-A'raf 7:186)

english_meaning: to provide sustenance, to give provision
example_sentence_ar: إِنَّ اللَّهَ هُوَ الرَّزَّاقُ ذُو الْقُوَّةِ الْمَتِينُ
example_sentence_en: Indeed, it is Allah who is the Provider, the firm possessor of strength (Adh-Dhariyat 51:58)

english_meaning: to send, to resurrect, to raise
example_sentence_en: Then We revived you after your death (Al-Baqarah 2:56)

english_meaning: to reckon, to think, to suppose
example_sentence_ar: أَحَسِبَ النَّاسُ أَنْ يُتْرَكُوا أَنْ يَقُولُوا آمَنَّا
example_sentence_en: Do the people think they will be left to say we believe? (Al-Ankabut 29:2)

example_sentence_ar: وَمَا ظَلَمْنَاهُمْ وَلَكِنْ كَانُوا أَنْفُسَهُمْ يَظْلِمُونَ
example_sentence_en: And We did not wrong them, but they wronged themselves (An-Nahl 16:118)

english_meaning: to think, to assume, to suspect
example_sentence_ar: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا اجْتَنِبُوا كَثِيرًا مِنَ الظَّنِّ
example_sentence_en: O believers, avoid much assumption (Al-Hujurat 49:12)
Due to Allah from the people is a pilgrimage to the House (Aal-Imran 3:97)
He has succeeded who purifies it (Ash-Shams 91:9)
And they followed what the devils used to recite (Al-Baqarah 2:102)

english_meaning: to convey, to deliver a message
example_sentence_ar: بَلِّغْ مَا أُنْزِلَ إِلَيْكَ مِنْ رَبِّكَ
example_sentence_en: Announce that which has been revealed to you from your Lord (Al-Ma'idah 5:67)
So flee to Allah (Adh-Dhariyat 51:50)

english_meaning: to be truthful, to speak the truth
example_sentence_en: Allah the Almighty has spoken the truth
Woe that Day to the deniers (Al-Mursalat 77:15)
Cut off the hands of the thief, male or female (Al-Ma'idah 5:38)

example_sentence_ar: شَهِدَ اللَّهُ أَنَّهُ لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا هُوَ
example_sentence_en: Allah witnesses that there is no deity except Him (Aal-Imran 3:18)
And He caused you to inherit their land and homes (Al-Ahzab 33:27)
And out of what We have provided them, they spend (Al-Baqarah 2:3)

example_sentence_ar: إِنَّمَا يُرِيدُ اللَّهُ لِيُذْهِبَ عَنْكُمُ الرِّجْسَ أَهْلَ الْبَيْتِ وَيُطَهِّرَكُمْ تَطْهِيرًا
example_sentence_en: Allah intends to remove impurity from you and purify you completely (Al-Ahzab 33:33)
And when I am ill, it is He who cures me (Ash-Shu'ara 26:80)

english_meaning: to be ill, to fall sick
example_sentence_en: And when I am ill, it is He who cures me (Ash-Shu'ara 26:80)
Read, and your Lord is the Most Generous (Al-Alaq 96:3)

example_sentence_ar: وَأَمَّا إِذَا مَا ابْتَلَاهُ فَقَدَرَ عَلَيْهِ رِزْقَهُ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّي أَهَانَنِ
example_sentence_en: But when He tries him and restricts his provision, he says: My Lord has humiliated me (Al-Fajr 89:16)
And they cut their hands (Yusuf 12:31)

example_sentence_ar: رَبَّنَا إِنَّكَ جَامِعُ النَّاسِ لِيَوْمٍ لَا رَيْبَ فِيهِ
example_sentence_en: Our Lord, You will gather the people for a Day about which there is no doubt (Aal-Imran 3:9)
And do not be like those who became divided (Aal-Imran 3:105)
And they withhold simple assistance (Al-Ma'un 107:7)
And He saved you from it (Aal-Imran 3:103)

example_sentence_ar: وَأَنْ لَيْسَ لِلْإِنْسَانِ إِلَّا مَا سَعَى
example_sentence_en: And that there is not for man except that for which he strives (An-Najm 53:39)
And stop them; indeed, they are to be questioned (As-Saffat 37:24)
So wait, I am with you among those who wait (Al-A'raf 7:71)
And their Lord will give them a purifying drink (Al-Insan 76:21)

example_sentence_ar: الَّذِي أَطْعَمَهُمْ مِنْ جُوعٍ وَآمَنَهُمْ مِنْ خَوْفٍ
example_sentence_en: Who has fed them against hunger and made them safe from fear (Quraysh 106:4)
And We ransomed him with a great sacrifice (As-Saffat 37:107)
And We caused to grow within it grain (Abasa 80:27)
Beneath which rivers flow (Al-Baqarah 2:25)

english_meaning: to make, to manufacture, to craft
example_sentence_en: And construct the ship under Our observation and inspiration (Hud 11:37)
The boy broke the glass

example_sentence_ar: فَتَّشَ عَنِ المِفْتَاحِ فِي كُلِّ مَكَانٍ
example_sentence_en: He searched for the key everywhere

english_meaning: to fix, to reform, to reconcile
example_sentence_ar: فَمَنْ تَابَ مِنْ بَعْدِ ظُلْمِهِ وَأَصْلَحَ
example_sentence_en: Whoever repents after his wrongdoing and reforms (Al-Ma'idah 5:39)

example_sentence_ar: وَلَا تُفْسِدُوا فِي الْأَرْضِ بَعْدَ إِصْلَاحِهَا
example_sentence_en: And cause not corruption on the earth after its reformation (Al-A'raf 7:56)
And Allah is encompassing of the disbelievers (Al-Baqarah 2:19)
Do they not ponder upon the Quran? (An-Nisa 4:82)
Indeed, association with Allah is great injustice (Luqman 31:13)
Say: He is Allah, the One (Al-Ikhlas 112:1)
And I blew into him of My spirit (Al-Hijr 15:29)

english_meaning: to form, to shape, to fashion
example_sentence_ar: هُوَ الَّذِي يُصَوِّرُكُمْ فِي الْأَرْحَامِ كَيْفَ يَشَاءُ
example_sentence_en: He it is who forms you in the wombs however He wills (Aal-Imran 3:6)
And the earth, We have spread it (Al-Hijr 15:19)
Allah is the Light of the heavens and the earth (An-Nur 24:35)
All praise is due to Allah, Lord of the worlds (Al-Fatiha 1:2)

example_sentence_ar: إِنَّ فِي خَلْقِ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ لَآيَاتٍ
example_sentence_en: Indeed, in the creation of the heavens and earth are signs (Aal-Imran 3:190)
Indeed, the punishment of your Lord will occur (At-Tur 52:7)
We have not sent you except as a mercy to the worlds (Al-Anbiya 21:107)

example_sentence_ar: وَسَارِعُوا إِلَى مَغْفِرَةٍ مِنْ رَبِّكُمْ وَجَنَّةٍ عَرْضُهَا السَّمَاوَاتُ وَالْأَرْضُ
example_sentence_en: Race toward forgiveness from your Lord and a Garden as wide as the heavens and earth (Aal-Imran 3:133)
And fear the Fire which has been prepared for the disbelievers (Aal-Imran 3:131)
That is because Allah is the Truth (Al-Hajj 22:6)
Truth has come and falsehood has departed (Al-Isra 17:81)
And say: My Lord, increase me in knowledge (Taha 20:114)
This is the Book about which there is no doubt (Al-Baqarah 2:2)
Guide us to the straight path (Al-Fatiha 1:6)
Master of the Day of Judgment (Al-Fatiha 1:4)
And faith has not yet entered your hearts (Al-Hujurat 49:14)
Indeed, the religion in the sight of Allah is Islam (Aal-Imran 3:19)
Monotheism is the foundation of Islam

example_sentence_ar: إِنَّ هَذَا الْقُرْآنَ يَهْدِي لِلَّتِي هِيَ أَقْوَمُ
example_sentence_en: Indeed, this Quran guides to that which is most suitable (Al-Isra 17:9)

example_sentence_ar: سُنَّةَ اللَّهِ الَّتِي قَدْ خَلَتْ مِنْ قَبْلُ
example_sentence_en: The established way of Allah which has occurred before (Al-Fath 48:23)
Our Lord, forgive us our sins (Aal-Imran 3:147)
Indeed, Allah loves those who are constantly repentant (Al-Baqarah 2:222)
And establish prayer and give zakah (Al-Baqarah 2:43)
And give zakah (Al-Baqarah 2:43)
Fasting has been prescribed for you (Al-Baqarah 2:183)
Hajj is during well-known months (Al-Baqarah 2:197)

example_sentence_ar: وَالْمَلَائِكَةُ يَدْخُلُونَ عَلَيْهِمْ مِنْ كُلِّ بَابٍ
example_sentence_en: And the angels will enter upon them from every gate (Ar-Ra'd 13:23)

example_sentence_ar: إِنَّ الشَّيْطَانَ لَكُمْ عَدُوٌّ فَاتَّخِذُوهُ عَدُوًّا
example_sentence_en: Indeed, Satan is an enemy to you, so take him as an enemy (Fatir 35:6)

example_sentence_ar: وَمَا مُحَمَّدٌ إِلَّا رَسُولٌ قَدْ خَلَتْ مِنْ قَبْلِهِ الرُّسُلُ
example_sentence_en: Muhammad is not but a messenger; other messengers have passed on before him (Aal-Imran 3:144)
Muhammad is the Messenger of Allah (Al-Fath 48:29)
You are the best nation produced for mankind (Aal-Imran 3:110)
Verily, in the remembrance of Allah do hearts find rest (Ar-Ra'd 13:28)
Every soul will taste death (Aal-Imran 3:185)
And they ask you about the soul (Al-Isra 17:85)
Will you not then use reason? (Al-Baqarah 2:44)

example_sentence_ar: وَمَا الْحَيَاةُ الدُّنْيَا إِلَّا مَتَاعُ الْغُرُورِ
example_sentence_en: And the worldly life is nothing but the enjoyment of delusion (Aal-Imran 3:185)
And the Hereafter is better for you than the first (Ad-Duha 93:4)

english_meaning: Day of Judgment, Day of Resurrection
example_sentence_en: I swear by the Day of Resurrection (Al-Qiyamah 75:1)
And the weighing on that Day will be true (Al-A'raf 7:8)
Indeed, Allah is swift in account (Al-Baqarah 2:202)
And strive in the cause of Allah (Al-Baqarah 2:218)
And fitnah is worse than killing (Al-Baqarah 2:191)
Blessed is He in whose hand is dominion (Al-Mulk 67:1)
Invite to the way of your Lord with wisdom (An-Nahl 16:125)

example_sentence_ar: ثُمَّ جَعَلْنَاكَ عَلَى شَرِيعَةٍ مِنَ الْأَمْرِ
example_sentence_en: Then We put you on an ordained way (Al-Jathiyah 45:18)
Indeed, Allah orders justice and good conduct (An-Nahl 16:90)
Indeed, association with Allah is great injustice (Luqman 31:13)

example_sentence_ar: مَنْ ذَا الَّذِي يُقْرِضُ اللَّهَ قَرْضًا حَسَنًا
example_sentence_en: Who is it that would loan Allah a goodly loan? (Al-Baqarah 2:245)
And has forbidden interest (Al-Baqarah 2:275)

example_sentence_ar: وَمَا يَنْطِقُ عَنِ الْهَوَى إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا وَحْيٌ يُوحَى
example_sentence_en: He does not speak from desire; it is only a revelation revealed (An-Najm 53:3-4)
The greatest miracle is the Quran
Indeed, I will make upon the earth a successive authority (Al-Baqarah 2:30)
